watery.translation[0].definitions[0].def: full of water or relating to water
watery.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Her eyes were red and watery from crying.
Snakes lay eggs in a watery environment.
watery.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: She gave him a watery smile.
watery.translation[0].definitions[2].def: watery food or drink contains too much water and has little taste
